SCTX:
Begin manisVirmScript

short test
short doOnce
short nolore

Set test to GetJournalIndex TG_LootAldruhnMG

if ( test == 0 )
	if ( GetDisabled == 0 )
		Disable
	endif
	Return
endif

if ( test >= 100 )
	if ( GetDisabled == 0 )
		Disable
	endif
	Return
endif

if ( doOnce == 1 )
	Return
endif

Enable
ForceGreeting
Set doOnce to 1

End
